snippet.title: Late Night Surfing - Official Trailer 1 | PC Game
snippet.description:
Tune in to TV straight from the dark dimension! Surf through channels and watch Looney Lou and the Small Red Chair reruns, the news, infomercials, a talk show, and uncover snippets from a mysterious home movie to dive deeper into your own fractured psyche. But beware: not everything on TV is real.

Game releases on itch.io on September 29, 2024.

#horrorgame #indiegame #itchio #visualnovel #latenightsurfing
